update t_authority
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},

ver_no = #{verNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update t_authority set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ver_no = #{verNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, add_acc_id = #{addAccId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, upd_time = #{updTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upd_acc_id = #{updAccId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id,parent_id parentId,name,path,type,status,ver_no, case type when 0 then 'depend/ztree/css/zTreeStyle/img/diy/1_close.png' when 1 then 'depend/ztree/css/zTreeStyle/img/diy/3.png' when 2 then 'depend/ztree/css/zTreeStyle/img/diy/4.png' end iconClose, case type when 0 then 'depend/ztree/css/zTreeStyle/img/diy/1_open.png' when 1 then 'depend/ztree/css/zTreeStyle/img/diy/2.png' when 2 then 'depend/ztree/css/zTreeStyle/img/diy/5.png' end iconOpen, 'true' open from t_authority
